subject: Baseball
Hurricane Katrina
lead_paragraph: One year after sports franchises in New Orleans were threatening to move out in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, the Mets are moving in. Their Class AAA affiliate will be the New Orleans Zephyrs.
snippet: One year after sports franchises in New Orleans were threatening to move out in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, the Mets are moving in. Their Class AAA affiliate will be the New Orleans Zephyrs.
